name: react-broker
description: Component lazy-loading + code splitting that works with SSR, Webpack 4, and Babel 7
author: Jared Lunde

scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:node-es
scripts.build:cjs: npm run build-lazy:cjs && npm run build-macro
scripts.build-lazy:es: rimraf dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src/lazy --out-dir dist/es && npm run prettier:es
scripts.build-lazy:node-es: rimraf dist/node-es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=node-es babel src/lazy --out-dir dist/node-es
scripts.build-lazy:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src/lazy --out-dir dist/cjs && npm run prettier:cjs
scripts.build-macro: rimraf macro && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src/macro --out-dir macro && npm run prettier-macro
scripts.watch: rimraf dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=es babel ./src/lazy -w --out-dir dist/es
scripts.watch-node: rimraf dist/node-es && cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=node-es babel ./src/lazy -w --out-dir dist/node-es
scripts.watch-macro: rimraf macro && cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=cjs babel ./src/macro -w --out-dir macro
